name: CAO - Flavours - Earth Nectar - Petit Corona
additionalNotes: CAO Earth Nectar pays homage to the bounty of Tuscany in this smooth smoke. A mixture of toasted almonds, cocoa, honey, and raisins is infused with the finest Chianti to lend a sweet, satisfying flavor to a fine Dominican blend. Finished with a Cameroon wrapper, CAO Earth Nectar is well-balanced cigar, layered in complexity.
